title: Development of a needle trap device packed with modified PAF-6-MNPs for sampling and analysis of polycyclic aromatic compounds in air
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18588-18598
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01651C, Paper

Mobina Hashemi, Abdulrahman Bahrami, Farshid Ghorbani-Shahna, Abas Afkhami, Maryam Farhadian, Ali Poormohamadi
The aim of this study was to develop a new method for sampling and analyzing polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons in the air.
